overview:
Ofira Kadmor joined Pitango in 2002 and currently serves as its Director of Finance. Prior to this, she held the position of Controller of Pitango.

Ofira is responsible for, among other things, the preparation of financial reports, Israeli and U.S. tax returns, as well as addressing tax issues, preparation of internal reports including monitoring and budgeting and acting as a liaison between Pitango and its Israeli and foreign accountants.

Prior to joining Pitango, Ofira was a Controller in a high-tech company. She also was a Senior Auditor at Kesselman & Kesselman, PricewaterhouseCoopers in Tel-Aviv and was responsible for a wide range of clients, which included among others, publicly traded companies, both on the NASDAQ and the Tel-Aviv Stock Exchange (TASE).

Ofira is a C.P.A. and holds an M.B.A. degree and a B.A. degree in Economics and Accounting, both from Tel Aviv University.
